columns.name: issuedForPiece
columns.description: Reference to the Piece the document was issued for

columns.name: aircraftLimitationInformation
columns.description: Contains the Special Handling Code related to the prescribed limitation. Hardcoded to PASSENGER AND CARGO AIRCRAFT or CARGO AIRCRAFT ONLY. This field is mandatory for air (Air)

columns.name: complianceDeclarationText
columns.description: Contains the warning message complying with the regulations text note. This field is mandatory for air (Air)

columns.name: handlingInformation
columns.description: Free text. This may include items such as Control temperature for substances stabilized by temperature control; name and telephone number of a responsible person for infectious substances.

columns.name: shipperDeclarationText
columns.description: Contains the shipper's declaration to comply with the regulations text note. Free text . This field is mandatory for air (Air)

columns.name: checks
columns.description: References to the CheckActions performed on the object

columns.name: skeletonIndicator
columns.description: Indicator whether a logistics object is a skeleton object
